hero.tagline: Qualified auxiliary nurse, passionate about care and human service.

about.title: About me
about.profileText: Auxiliary nurses administer nursing care to patients, usually under the supervision of doctors, registered nurses or other health team members. Graduated in 2024 from IFSI School in Khouribga, I have gained solid experience in various hospital departments and health centers.
about.motivationText: My passion for this profession stems from the deep conviction that every patient deserves quality care delivered with compassion and professionalism. I strive daily to bring comfort and support to those who need it.

experience.title: Professional experience
experience.subtitle: Internships and practical training in different services
experience.hospitalDescription: Comprehensive training in various hospital departments with acquisition of diverse nursing skills.
experience.centersDescription: Experience in proximity care and direct contact with the local community in different health centers.

skills.title: Skills
skills.analyzeDescription: Ability to analyze clinical situations and accurately transcribe medical information.
skills.methodologyDescription: Methodical and rigorous approach in executing care and medical procedures.
skills.adaptationDescription: Ability to adapt to specific needs of each patient for personalized care.
skills.relationalDescription: Excellent communication skills with patients, families, and medical teams.
skills.pedagogyDescription: Ability to explain and teach good health practices to patients.
skills.vigilanceDescription: Careful monitoring of patient condition and early detection of changes.

contact.subtitle: Feel free to contact me for any professional opportunity
